search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Contacts+ (contacts-plus.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Contacts+ is: [https://www.contactsplus.com/pricing/](https://www.contactsplus.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Pricing - The Best Cross-Platform Contact Manager App | Contacts+

Stay In Sync. Enrich Your  
Relationships.
------------------------------------------

Sync the latest info on every contact in your own personal CRM.
---------------------------------------------------------------

Monthly Annually (Get 3 months free)

### Free

Try it. Sync your contacts across devices and work from a central address book.

#### $0

[Sign Up Free](https://app.contactsplus.com/register/individual)

##### Includes

*   Sync 1 Account  
    (Apple, Google, Microsoft)
*   1,000 Contacts
*   Daily Sync

🔥 Fuel Your Network

### Premium

Powerful contact syncing and enrichment for networkers.

#### $9.99 per month

[Buy Now](https://app.contactsplus.com/register/individual?returnTo=https://app.contactsplus.com/subscription)

##### Includes

*   Sync 5 Accounts  
    (Apple, Google, Microsoft)
*   25,000 Contacts
*   Quick Sync
*   Contact Enrichment
*   Email Signature Extraction

### Teams

A dynamic shared address book for groups and organizations.

#### $12.99 per user, per month

[Buy Now](https://app.contactsplus.com/register/individual?returnTo=https://app.contactsplus.com/subscription)

##### Includes

*   Sync 10 Accounts  
    (Apple, Google, Microsoft)
*   25,000 Contacts
*   Quick Sync
*   Contact Enrichment
*   Email Signature Extraction
*   Shared Address Book

### Free

Try it. Sync your contacts across devices and work from a central address book.

#### $0

[Sign Up Free](https://app.contactsplus.com/register/individual)

##### Includes

*   Sync 1 Account  
    (Apple, Google, Microsoft)
*   1,000 Contacts
*   Daily Sync

🔥 Fuel Your Network

### Premium

Powerful contact syncing and enrichment for networkers.

#### $13.99 per month

[Buy Now](https://app.contactsplus.com/register/individual?returnTo=https://app.contactsplus.com/subscription)

##### Includes

*   Sync 5 Accounts  
    (Apple, Google, Microsoft)
*   25,000 Contacts
*   Quick Sync
*   Contact Enrichment
*   Email Signature Extraction

### Teams

A dynamic shared address book for groups and organizations.

#### $17.99 per user, per month

[Buy Now](https://app.contactsplus.com/register/individual?returnTo=https://app.contactsplus.com/subscription)

##### Includes

*   Sync 10 Accounts  
    (Apple, Google, Microsoft)
*   25,000 Contacts
*   Quick Sync
*   Contact Enrichment
*   Email Signature Extraction
*   Shared Address Book

[Compare Plan Features](https://www.contactsplus.com/pricing/#feature-table)

Features

Premium

---------------------

Manage contacts in any web browser. Perfect for your desktop.

Add and update contacts from any social network while you browse in Chrome.

Add custom tags to easily segment your contacts.



 | ![Image 54: pic](blob:http://localhost/0b6a6f121d51197bfd99a891dabca80f) | ![Image 56: pic](blob:http://localhost/0b6a6f121d51197bfd99a891dabca80f) | ![Image 58: pic](blob:http://localhost/0b6a6f121d51197bfd99a891dabca80f) |

Built-in tags are automatically added to contacts to help instantly identify key segments.

Instantly turn business cards into contacts.

Easily import contacts from a .csv file or vCard.

We match publicly available data with your contact records to complete and update your contact profiles.

We'll detect duplicates. Choose to merge automatically or manually.



 | ![Image 98: pic](blob:http://localhost/0b6a6f121d51197bfd99a891dabca80f) | ![Image 100: pic](blob:http://localhost/0b6a6f121d51197bfd99a891dabca80f) | ![Image 102: pic](blob:http://localhost/0b6a6f121d51197bfd99a891dabca80f) |
| Contact Clean-Up

We identify outdated social accounts, websites and email addresses so you can remove them for clean contact records.

Integrate with Gmail to add and update contacts from email signatures in your inbox.



 | ![Image 110: pic](blob:http://localhost/0b6a6f121d51197bfd99a891dabca80f) | ![Image 112: pic](blob:http://localhost/0b6a6f121d51197bfd99a891dabca80f) | ![Image 114: pic](blob:http://localhost/0b6a6f121d51197bfd99a891dabca80f) |

| Activity Feed

See recent updates to your address book.



 | 30 days of activity | 6 months of activity | 6 months of activity |

Get notified on a contact's birthday - the perfect opportunity to reach out.



 | ![Image 116: pic](blob:http://localhost/0b6a6f121d51197bfd99a891dabca80f) | ![Image 118: pic](blob:http://localhost/0b6a6f121d51197bfd99a891dabca80f) | ![Image 120: pic](blob:http://localhost/0b6a6f121d51197bfd99a891dabca80f) |

Team Owner, Admin and Member accounts have unique privileges.

What Customers Are Saying
-------------------------

Absolutely the best contact app, I’m now in charge of my contacts, no more double entries, second to none.

Dave Penney Google Play Review

Want to solve your phonebook mess across multiple accounts and devices? Look no further.

Shahnewaz Ahmed Google Play Review

The best contact manager. Is able to seamlessly merge multiple contacts from multiple sources and provides a clean easy way to contact the right person in the right way. Brilliant.

Michael Nguyen Google Play Review

The Best: This is the most comprehensive and effective app for managing your contacts!

jschwtzr Google Play Review

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

[What payment methods do you accept?](https://www.contactsplus.com/pricing/#) [_Expand_](https://www.contactsplus.com/pricing/#)

You can pay for Contacts+ with any major credit card or with your iTunes or Google Play accounts via our iOS or Android apps. We do not support payment using Paypal, Bitcoin, or any other alternative payment method.

[Can I cancel anytime?](https://www.contactsplus.com/pricing/#) [_Expand_](https://www.contactsplus.com/pricing/#)

Yes. If you cancel, we’ll end your plan as of the next subscription cycle. You can learn more about our cancellation policy [here](https://www.contactsplus.com/terms/). Also, your contact data is yours, so you can always export your contacts if you choose to cancel.

[Do I get a discount for paying on an annual basis?](https://www.contactsplus.com/pricing/#) [_Expand_](https://www.contactsplus.com/pricing/#)

Yes. With an annual subscription, you’ll pay for two months (or 17%) less over the course of the year.

[What happens when I switch from the Premium to Team plans?](https://www.contactsplus.com/pricing/#) [_Expand_](https://www.contactsplus.com/pricing/#)

Do I have to pay for both? No. When you switch, you’ll keep all your Premium features but only pay for your new Teams plan.

[Can I switch plans?](https://www.contactsplus.com/pricing/#) [_Expand_](https://www.contactsplus.com/pricing/#)

Yes, you can switch between any of our paid plans, including from monthly to annual billing, at any time.

[How does the business card scanner work?](https://www.contactsplus.com/pricing/#) [_Expand_](https://www.contactsplus.com/pricing/#)

For Premium or Teams users, simply scan a business card with your iOS or Android mobile device. Our business card AI will automatically transcribe the card into a contact record. You can edit the contact record before saving it to your synced accounts.

[What are contact updates?](https://www.contactsplus.com/pricing/#) [_Expand_](https://www.contactsplus.com/pricing/#)

Contacts+ searches for publicly available information to add to your contacts, including photos, job titles, locations, social media profiles, and more. Basic accounts receive updates each month. Premium accounts receive updates each day.

[How does contact sync work?](https://www.contactsplus.com/pricing/#) [_Expand_](https://www.contactsplus.com/pricing/#)

**Basic Plan:** Contacts+ pulls changes once per day from your accounts like Google, iCloud, and Outlook/Office 365.

**Premium and Team Plan:** Changes are pulled from your account in real time. Under Premium plans, any changes made in Contacts+ will immediately push back to connected accounts.

For the Free plan, changes will push back once per day.

Still Need Answers?
-------------------

Visit our [support site](https://support.contactsplus.com/) for more.

[Visit Now](https://support.contactsplus.com/)

The most intuitive contact management app for professionals, teams, and small businesses. Easily manage your relationships with Contacts+.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Annual plans offer a discount equivalent to 17% off monthly pricing.
